summary: The implementation partially addresses the requirements. REQ-3 (About Us page with founder details) is fully implemented with all specified information. REQ-1 (admin account creation) shows backend credential storage but password hashing appears incomplete. REQ-2 (admin login page validation) is not evident in the diff. REQ-4 (founder profile backend storage) shows storage structures but doesn't clearly demonstrate the required functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the admin login page (frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx) to validate credentials against the backend email-password authentication system
missing_requirements.reason: The modified file list does not include frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx. The diff shows no changes to the admin login page to implement backend credential validation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores hashed password for admin account - proper password hashing implementation
missing_requirements.reason: The hashPassword function in backend/main.mo simply returns the password unchanged (password; without any hashing algorithm), which does not meet the requirement for storing hashed passwords securely.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend can query and retrieve founder profile data from backend
missing_requirements.reason: While FounderProfile type is defined in backend, the About Us page hardcodes all founder data in the frontend (profile object with hardcoded values). There's no evidence of querying backend for founder profile data.

hallucinated_features.description: FounderProfile includes emailAddress and instagramProfile fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specified name, contact number, WhatsApp number, and location. Email and Instagram profile were not part of the requirements but are implemented in both backend type definition and frontend display.
